How to play:

You win an encounter by eliminating all enemy units.

You lose an encounter when all your units are eliminated, or the timer runs out.

Whenever you lose an encounter, you lose 1 life per enemy unit left.

Controls

Use the left mouse button to drag and drop code.

Mouse over elements to view more details.

Use the right mouse button to navigate around.

You can also drag and drop your units. You cannot place them any further up than 1 on the Y axis.

You can switch between the grid and code by putting the mouse on the edge of the screen.

Once you are ready to go, press the "Start Program" button. After each round, you can then choose new blocks to add to your code.

Good luck!
